Holiday Dining & Special Events
Seasonal Menus. Oceanfront Moments.
A Year-Round Calendar of Coastal Flavor
At Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort, dining goes beyond daily menus. Throughout the year, our culinary team curates seasonal offerings that mark each occasion with intention and flavor. From Easter brunches to
Thanksgiving feasts
,
summer fireworks
to festive New Year's spreads.
Now Booking: Thanksgiving Brunch Buffet - Thursday, November 27, 2025 | 11:00 AM - 4:00 PM
CHECK OUT THE FULL MENU HERE
For reservations, call 386-947-8054.
This is your home base for holiday dining, weekend specials, and one-day-only events designed to elevate your stay or local plans. Whether you're here with family for Mother's Day, planning a private toast on Valentine's weekend, or reserving a seat at our Thanksgiving buffet, our seasonal menus bring the celebration to the table.
Select menus are hosted in
Doc Bales' Grill
,
Don Rico's Sports Bar & Grill
,
Coquina Ballroom
, or through
In-Room Dining
, with details and availability updated regularly. Limited-time offerings will be listed below as dates approach.
Thanksgiving Brunch Buffet
Featuring
Thanksgiving Brunch Buffet
Thursday, November 27, 2025 | 11:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Adults $59.75++ | Children (Ages 5-12) $21.75++ | Children 4 and under dine free
Featured items include:
Slow-roasted prime rib with au jus and whipped horseradish
Herb-rubbed turkey with garlic, rosemary, and fresh cranberry sauce
Lobster mac & cheese and Southern-style green beans with smoky bacon
Chilled seafood display with jumbo shrimp, mussels, clams, and snow crab legs
Seasonal pastries, artisan breads, and a local cheese board
Holiday dessert station featuring pumpkin tiramisu, chocolate raspberry ganache tarts, and strawberry Basque cheesecake
Complimentary valet parking and non-alcoholic beverages included
Reservations required. For reservations, call 386-947-8054.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
Thanksgiving Brunch Buffet
Featuring
Thanksgiving Brunch Buffet
Thursday, November 27, 2025 | 11:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Adults $59.75++ | Children (Ages 5-12) $21.75++ | Children 4 and under dine free
Featured items include:
Slow-roasted prime rib with au jus and whipped horseradish
Herb-rubbed turkey with garlic, rosemary, and fresh cranberry sauce
Lobster mac & cheese and Southern-style green beans with smoky bacon
Chilled seafood display with jumbo shrimp, mussels, clams, and snow crab legs
Seasonal pastries, artisan breads, and a local cheese board
Holiday dessert station featuring pumpkin tiramisu, chocolate raspberry ganache tarts, and strawberry Basque cheesecake
Complimentary valet parking and non-alcoholic beverages included
Reservations required. For reservations, call 386-947-8054.
Pricing and availability subject to change.
100 N Atlantic Ave., Daytona Beach, Florida, 32118
386-254-8200
|

Back to Summer
Two-Night Special at Hilton Daytona Beach
Catch the Sun. Extend the Season. Save More.
Chase summer a little longer with up to 25% off when you stay 2+ nights.
Trade back-to-school for back to the beach. This fall, enjoy ocean views, poolside lounging, and Hilton signature service at Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort.
Use Promo Code: VACAY
Book your Daytona Beach fall getaway now. Stay 2+ nights, pre-pay, and save.
Why Choose a Fall Getaway at the Hilton Daytona Beach?
Oceanfront location steps from the sand, the Boardwalk, and
Ocean Walk Shoppes
Seasonal events like Biketoberfest, Daytona Turkey Run, and the Tanger Outlet Tree Lighting
Easy access to
dining
, nightlife, and
attractions
NCAA Men's Basketball at the
Ocean Center
: UCF's Legends Classic game, Boardwalk Battle, and Sunshine Slam
Live concerts and comedy at the
Peabody Auditorium
, featuring Gary Allan, Tom Segura, and Jo Koy
Book Now
Offer Details
Offer Details
Save up to 25%
2-night minimum stay required
Pre-payment required at booking
Non-refundable
Based on availability, blackout dates may apply

Coastal Rewards Escape
Earn 10K Bonus Honors Points on a 2-Night Stay
Stay Longer. Earn More. Relax at the Coast.
A Rewarding (10,000 times) Daytona Beach Hotel Package.
This limited-time coastal offer combines ocean views, beach access, and resort amenities with one of the best Hilton Honors bonuses available. Every night you stay works harder for your next getaway.
Use Promo Code: 10K
To enjoy 10,000 Bonus Hilton Honors points!
Why Choose the Coastal Rewards Escape?
Earn 10,000
Hilton Honors
Bonus Points on a minimum 2-night stay
Oceanfront resort directly on
Daytona Beach Boardwalk
Steps from
Ocean Walk Shoppes
,
Pier
, and
Peabody Auditorium
Poolside relaxation, beachfront access, and
signature dining on property
Reward yourself now and redeem points later at
thousands of Hilton hotels
worldwide
Book Now
Offer Details
Offer Details

Valid on stays of 2 nights or more (Minimum 2-night stay required)
Stays starting through December 31, 2025
Subject to availability and blackout dates
Hilton Honors membership required

Meet at the Beach
Event Savings & Complimentary Perks
Meet at The Beach: Oceanfront Meeting Packages at Hilton Daytona Beach
Exclusive Savings on Oceanfront Event Space Near Ocean Center.
Host your next memorable meeting, conference, or convention at
Hilton Daytona Beach Oceanfront Resort
, the premier conference venue in Daytona Beach.
Take advantage of our
Meet at The Beach
offer, available for events occurring between
Now and December 31, 2025
. Enjoy exceptional savings, free amenities, and
customizable options
tailored to your event needs.
Our Meet at The Beach program offers three group meeting packages designed for everything from executive sessions to full conventions:
Executive Power Meetings | Impact Conferences | Premier Conventions
Check out our
Meet at The Beach flyer
for the full list of perks!
Contact our Sales Team to discuss tailored meeting planner perks and start building your Daytona Beach event today
:
[email protected]
Highlights include...
EXECUTIVE POWER MEETING (Up To 25 Guests):
Over $9,000 in savings per night
Waived resort fees & complimentary self-parking
50,000 Hilton Meeting Planner Points Signing Bonus
IMPACT CONFERENCE (25-250 Rooms/Night):
Over $36,000 in savings per night
Complimentary breakfast & Hospitality Suite
Waived resort fees & discounted self-parking
One (1) bonus perk
PREMIER CONVENTION (250+ Rooms/Night):
Over $36,000 in savings per night
Impact Conference Package
Two (2) bonus perks

Park, Eat & Play
Fuel Your Stay with Free Parking & Breakfast
Drive In. Dine Well. Stay Right on the Beach.
Free Valet Parking + Daily Breakfast Included.
Simplify your getaway with a package designed for value and convenience. Park free, fuel up each morning with complimentary breakfast, and stay steps from the Boardwalk and Ocean Walk Shoppes. Whether you're here for events at the Ocean Center or a weekend in the breeze, this package offer makes it easy to relax and explore.
Use Promo Code: NP
For Free Parking & Complimentary Breakfast!
Why Choose the Park, Eat & Play Package at Hilton Daytona Beach?
Oceanfront location on the
Daytona Beach Boardwalk
Complimentary valet parking for one vehicle per day
Daily breakfast
for registered adults in your room
Easy access to the
Ocean Center
,
Peabody Auditorium
, and
local attractions
Walk to dining, nightlife, and entertainment at
Ocean Walk Village
Book Now
Offer Details
Offer Details
Complimentary valet parking: One vehicle per room, per day
Daily breakfast for all registered adults in the room
Subject to availability and blackout dates

Southern Hospitality
Exclusive Savings for Our Local Guests
Staycation Savings for our Southern Neighbors.
There's no place like home, especially when it's this close to the coast. Save 20% on Daytona Beach Oceanfront Stays!
Walk to dining, nightlife, and attractions, or simply relax poolside at our full-service Daytona Beach resort. Hilton signature service ensures your coastal escape feels close to home, but better.
Use Promo Code: FLARES
For some Southern Hospitality & Good Ol' Savings!
Looking for the biggest savings?
If your plans are firm and you're ready to pre-pay, check out our
Summer Stays
offer for up to 25% off standard rates. It's our best value of the season, with a two-night minimum and prepayment required.
Why Choose the Southern Hospitality Rate?
Oceanfront hotel directly on the
Daytona Beach Boardwalk
Up to 20% off rooms for Florida, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi, and Carolina residents
Walkable access to
Ocean Walk Shoppes
,
Pier
, and
Peabody Auditorium
Easy drives for guests from Orlando, Jacksonville, and Savannah
Plenty of quick,
nonstop flights
from Atlanta and Charlotte right to Daytona Beach
Full resort amenities including pools, beach access, and
multiple dining options
Book Now
Offer Details
Offer Details
Up to 20% Off Room Rates
Available to residents of Florida, Georgia, Alabama, South Carolina, and North Carolina
Valid state-issued ID required at check-in
Discount applied to Best Available Rate
Subject to availability
Blackout dates my apply
Offer may change or end at any time
